line_1: Tho' I maun say't, I wad be silly,
line_2: I Gat your letter, winsome Willie;

line_1: Tho' I maun say't, I wad be silly,
line_2: Wi' gratefu' heart I thank you brawlie;

line_1: Tho' I maun say't, I wad be silly,
line_2: Should I believe, my coaxin billie,

line_1: To sigh for Ribbands if thou art so silly,
line_2: Mark how they grace Lord Umbra, or Sir Billy.
